text.text_translated:
Many best-selling album artists stop releasing new music when they are old.  
But Bruce Springsteen still releases new music.  
It is number one and fills stadiums.  
He is still at the top of his game.  
He is in his late 60s.  
I am not surprised.  
He tells our most important stories about ourselves.  
When you listen to his song “Born in the USA”, the stories stay most important today.
